title: Medieval times: the role of the church
brief_description: Uses costumed re-enactments to show the vast influences of the church on the nobility, scholars, clergy and the peasants of the Middle Ages, and the role of the church in shaping European history then and in centuries to come. Includes views of churches and cathedrals of Europe and of medieval art.
